mapper.update: update stadium set stadium_name = #{stadiumName}, province = #{province}, city=#{city}, court_number=#{courtNumber}, address=#{address}, phone=#{phone}, remarks=#{remarks} WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT id,stadium_name,province,city,court_number,address,phone,remarks,owner FROM stadium where owner = #{owner} order by `order` desc;
mapper.insert: insert into stadium (id, stadium_name, province, city, court_number, address, phone, remarks, owner) values (#{id}, #{stadiumName}, #{province}, #{city}, #{courtNumber}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{remarks}, #{owner});
